data.name: Goat of Duty Wallpapers & Covers Pack
data.detailed_description:
This DLC includes:
  • Three 4K Exclusive Wallpapers
  • Two Official Goat of Duty Covers

We are already very proud of all of you goating around this sensational multiplayer shooter! You are amazing players and we encourage you to purchase this DLC if you want to keep supporting this initiative with us.
data.about_the_game:
This DLC includes:
  • Three 4K Exclusive Wallpapers
  • Two Official Goat of Duty Covers

We are already very proud of all of you goating around this sensational multiplayer shooter! You are amazing players and we encourage you to purchase this DLC if you want to keep supporting this initiative with us.
data.short_description: This DLC Pack includes: Three 4K Exclusive Wallpapers + Two Official Goat of Duty Covers.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Turkish, Russian, Japanese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: i3 2.6Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Graphics Pro 580 (or equivalent)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i7 3.0Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050Ti or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
